custom-meta.meta-value: The data used can be found in the paper: Métras R, Cavalerie L, Dommergues L, Mérot P, Edmunds WJ, Keeling MJ, et al. (2016) The Epidemiology of Rift Valley Fever in Mayotte: Insights and Perspectives from 11 Years of Data. PLoS Negl Trop Dis 10(6): e0004783. doi: 10.1371/journal.pntd.0004783 ( https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pntd.0004783).
